# 1 Getting Started

## 1.1 Install and Load 

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, readxl, SmartEDA, easystats, gtsummary)
```

## 1.2 Import Data

```{r}
car_resale <-
  read_xls("data/ToyotaCorolla.xls", "data")
```

```{r}
summary(car_resale)
```

```{r}
glimpse(car_resale)
```

```{r}
summary(car_resale)
```

## 1.3 Data Oveview

```{r}
car_resale %>% 
  ExpData(type = 1)
```

```{r}
car_resale %>% 
  ExpData(type = 2)
```
